pros: The students make it worth going to work.
cons: While not a buzzword during my tenure, the administration seemed to have perfected "Quiet Hiring", requiring each employee to continue working past the expectations set initially with quips like "for every one of you, there are ten more that we could hire". The last line of each academic contract reads "and other duties as assigned" - this allows any responsibility to be assigned with no consideration for appropriateness of task, pay, or time required.
